titleStmt.title: To shew the countreys consent for the drayning of Lindesy Levell.
titleStmt.author: Killigrew, William, Sir, 1606-1695.
Heron, Henry, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: The 16. of March. 1670. William Killigrew, Henry Heron. Dated according to Lady day dating.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
